Bash(git -C /Users/user/Documents/CryptoSavingsTracker commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(android\): implement Phase 1 foundation with Room, Hilt, and Compose

Complete Android foundation setup including:

Database layer:
- 9 Room entities \(Goal, Asset, Transaction, AssetAllocation, etc.\)
- 9 DAOs with Flow-based reactive queries
- Type converters for dates \(epochDay/epochMillis strategy\)
- AppDatabase with schema export

Dependency injection:
- Hilt setup with @HiltAndroidApp Application class
- DatabaseModule providing Room database and DAOs

Navigation & UI:
- Jetpack Compose Navigation with bottom bar
- 4 main screens: Dashboard, Goals, Assets, Planning \(placeholders\)
- Material3 theme with accessible color palette
- Edge-to-edge display support

Build configuration:
- Version catalog \(libs.versions.toml\) with all dependencies
- KSP for Room and Hilt annotation processing
- Compose compiler plugin configuration

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/user/Documents/CryptoSavingsTracker commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(android\): implement Phase 2 Goal CRUD operations

Complete Goal management with clean architecture:

Domain Layer:
- Goal domain model with lifecycle status and reminders
- GoalRepository interface
- Use cases: GetGoals, GetGoalById, AddGoal, UpdateGoal, DeleteGoal

Data Layer:
- GoalMapper for entity/domain conversion
- GoalRepositoryImpl with Room DAO integration
- RepositoryModule for Hilt DI bindings

Presentation Layer:
- GoalListViewModel with filtering by status
- GoalsScreen with LazyColumn, filter chips, and empty states
- GoalDetailViewModel with status updates and deletion
- GoalDetailScreen with progress display and timeline
- AddEditGoalViewModel with form validation
- AddEditGoalScreen with date pickers and currency selection
- Navigation wiring for all goal screens

Features:
- Create, read, update, delete goals
- Filter goals by lifecycle status \(Active, Paused, Completed, Cancelled\)
- Form validation for required fields
- Reminder configuration with frequency options
- Visual status indicators with accessible colors

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/user/Documents/CryptoSavingsTracker commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(android\): fix GoalLifecycleStatus parity and add comprehensive DAO tests

iOS Parity Fixes:
- Update GoalLifecycleStatus enum to match iOS exactly: active, cancelled, finished, deleted
- Remove PAUSED/COMPLETED values that didn''t exist in iOS
- Add rawValue property for consistent database storage

Goal Domain Model:
- Add all missing fields: emoji, link, lifecycleStatusChangedAt, reminderTimeMillis, firstReminderDate
- Rename ''notes'' to ''description'' to match iOS
- Add isReminderEnabled computed property matching iOS behavior
- Update GoalMapper to map ALL fields preventing data loss on roundtrip

Presentation Layer Updates:
- Update GoalFilter enum to match new lifecycle statuses
- Update all UI components to use FINISHED instead of COMPLETED
- Remove references to PAUSED status
- Update AddEditGoalViewModel to handle new field names

DAO Test Coverage \(100%\):
- GoalDaoTest: 25 tests covering all CRUD operations, queries, and edge cases
- AssetDaoTest: 22 tests covering all CRUD operations and unique constraints
- TransactionDaoTest: 25 tests including cascade delete, aggregations, and foreign keys

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

fix\(android\): implement Phase 2 fixes for progress and navigation

Progress Calculation:
- Create AllocationRepository interface and implementation

- Add link section to show goal links

Asset Edit Navigation:

- Add EditAsset composable to AppNavHost
- Wire up edit button in AssetDetailScreen to navigate to edit screen

Transaction Navigation:

- Wire up "View All" transactions button
- Add proper navigation to AddTransaction and TransactionHistory screens

All progress calculations match iOS formula: allocatedAmount / targetAmount

Bash(git -C /Users/user/Documents/CryptoSavingsTracker commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(android\): implement Phase 2 allocation system with iOS parity

Progress Calculation \(iOS Parity\):
- Fix progress formula to use min\(allocation.amount, assetManualBalance\)
- Add fundedAmount field to GoalWithProgress for actual backed amount
- Update GoalsScreen and GoalDetailScreen to display funded progress
- Add getManualBalanceForAsset\(\) to TransactionDao/Repository

Allocation CRUD UI:
- Create AllocationListScreen with summary card and allocation cards
- Create AddAllocationScreen with asset selection and amount input
- Add AllocationListViewModel with over-allocation detection
- Add AddAllocationViewModel with validation
- Add navigation routes for allocation screens

AllocationHistory Snapshots:
- Create AllocationHistory domain model with monthLabel
- Create AllocationHistoryRepository interface and implementation
- Create AllocationHistoryService for snapshot creation
- Create snapshots on allocation add/update/delete \(deletion uses amount=0\)

Over-Allocation Detection:
- Create AllocationValidationService with AssetAllocationStatus
- Add isOverAllocated, isUnderfunded flags to AllocationWithDetails
- Display warning banner when assets are over-allocated
- Show visual indicators on allocation cards \(color-coded backgrounds\)
- Display over-allocation amounts and funded vs allocated values

Goal Edit Enhancements:

- Add link input field to AddEditGoalScreen

Bash(git -C /Users/user/Documents/CryptoSavingsTracker commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(android\): implement Exchange Rate and Monthly Planning services

Exchange Rate Service:
- Create ExchangeRateRepository interface with fetchRate, hasValidConfiguration, clearCache
- Implement ExchangeRateRepositoryImpl with CoinGecko API integration
- Add CoinGeckoApi Retrofit interface with simple/price and coins/markets endpoints
- Create NetworkModule for Hilt DI with OkHttp client and API key interceptor
- Support crypto-to-fiat, fiat-to-fiat \(via USDT\), and crypto-to-crypto \(via USD\) conversions
- Implement rate caching with 5-minute expiration in SharedPreferences
- Map common crypto symbols to CoinGecko IDs \(BTC, ETH, etc.\)

Monthly Planning Service:
- Create MonthlyRequirement domain model matching iOS structure
- Add RequirementStatus enum \(COMPLETED, ON_TRACK, ATTENTION, CRITICAL\)
- Implement MonthlyPlanningService with payment day configuration
- Calculate monthly requirements based on remaining amount and months to deadline
- Support configurable payment day \(1-28\) for accurate period calculation
- Integrate with ExchangeRateRepository for multi-currency total calculation

Monthly Planning UI:
- Create MonthlyPlanningScreen with requirement cards and total summary
- Create MonthlyPlanningViewModel with reactive state management
- Add status summary row with color-coded chips \(Critical, Attention, On Track, Done\)
- Add payment day settings dialog with slider \(1-28\)
- Update PlanningScreen to delegate to MonthlyPlanningScreen
- Add accessible status colors to theme \(AccessibleGreen, AccessibleRed, AccessibleYellow\)

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
